text: The 1982 Campeonato Nacional was Chilean football league top tier’s 50th season. Cobreloa was the tournament’s champion, winning its second title. ==League table== ==Results== == Topscorer == {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:95%; text-align:center;" |- !width="205"|Name !width="205"|Team !width="50"|Goals |- || Jorge Luis Siviero||Cobreloa||18 |} ==Liguilla Pre- Copa Libertadores== \---- \---- ==Promotion/relegation Liguilla== == See also == * 1982 Copa Polla Gol == References == == External links == *ANFP *RSSSF Chile 1982 Category:Primera División de Chile seasons Chile Prim
title: 1982 Primera División de Chile
